text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For today's training, Narita Taishin<n>asks for help building
her strength.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as I arrive at the gym, I see the<n>stern athlete about to
lift a barbell.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: All right, I've got this...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She yanks it up, but the weight's<n>momentum throws her off
balance!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: So... heavy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I help hold the barbell and slowly<n>lower it to the floor.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Gasp... Gasp... Damn it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It would probably be a good idea to<n>warm up before she
gets herself hurt.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What? You saying I can't handle it?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: That anyone as scrawny as me<n>should just give up?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's clear the irritated trainee has<n>enough strength to lift the
barbell.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But she needs to slow down and<n>warm up properly first. I
try to explain<n>why.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though she appears reluctant, the<n>stubborn student does as
instructed<n>for now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I assign some light jogging on the<n>treadmill to raise her
body temp and<n>heart rate, then cap it off with<n>stretching to
loosen her muscles.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Having finished the comprehensive<n>warm-up, Narita Taishin
once again<n>stands before the barbell.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hgh... Hng!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This time, she's a lot steadier, and<n>she's able to lift the
barbell with no<n>problem.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I did it!
choice_data_list: Looks like you've got the hang of it.
Looks like you've got the hang of it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: A little, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her words express some doubt, but<n>she's got it down.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Dumbbell training is going smoothly,<n>but it could be better if I
adjusted her<n>shaky posture...
choice_data_list:
Can you straighten out your upper body a little
more?

Can you straighten out your upper body a little
more?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ...I'll try.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For the rest of the training, she<n>seems to take my
instructions more<n>willingly than before.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the workout finished, I go over<n>the day's
accomplishments.
choice_data_list: How'd you feel with today's training?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Um... Fine, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Oh, right. Hey, um...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I think I might wanna do that warm-up<n>you showed me from
now on.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It made things... Well, my body felt<n>easier to move, I think.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't hide my excitement. I wasn't<n>expecting such a
positive response<n>from her.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh, what the heck... Chill out, would<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Are we done wrapping up? Cause<n>I'm gonna split.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Though training seems to be going<n>well with her...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There are still some obstacles to<n>overcome before we can
truly be<n>partners.
